doc.description:
Digital Photo Camera Triggering (using a servo)
This module controls triggering of an attached external digital camera via a servo channel. It can trigger photos based on GPS distance, time or circle radius in both fixedwings and rotorcraft.

define.name: DC_SHOOT_ON_BUTTON_RELEASE
define.description: if defined, call dc_send_shot_postion on button release instead of on push

define.name: DC_ZOOM_IN_SERVO
define.description: optional, Servo to activate zoom in

define.name: DC_ZOOM_OUT_SERVO
define.description: optional, Servo to activate zoom out

define.name: DC_AUTOSHOOT_PERIOD
define.description: time period for DC_AUTOSHOOT_PERIODIC in seconds
